metadata.summary: One of my first big projects at Turnstyle (circa 2019) was a total redesign of Teague's website. It was fitting that one of my last projects was evolving and streamlining the design system and CMS we built years prior to remove cruft and make it more flexible, scalable, and future-proof.

content.headline: develops beautiful solutions to complex problems
content.description: Teague is a design and innovation company that combines technological expertise with a deep understanding of human behavior. Leveraging previously completed branding and positioning work, we helped them design and build a website that could serve as the bold, new entry point to their philosophy, portfolio, and approach. Key goals of the design process included expressing Teague's differentiated point of view, grounding the brand narrative in client needs and value, and projecting their vision of a better future in a clear, digestible form.

media.alt: The about page design for the Teague website
The case study template design for the Teague website
A grid of desktop screenshots showing off the design of the Teague Website

metadata.summary: Cipher is a publication covering the global transition to net-zero. Based on our work establishing their brand and visual identity, the Cipher team collaborated with us to translate their identity to a web-native design system and build a bespoke digital experience for their content.

As part of an effort to reposition themselves in the market, we developed a comprehensive visual identity system for one of Seattle's most notable real estate developers. This work included a new website, rebuilt from first principles, and a virtual artwalk microsite.

content.headline: is laying foundations for great futures
content.description: A brainchild of Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen and the engine behind Seattle's vibrant South Lake Union neighborhood, Vulcan Real Estate is one of the Pacific Northwest’s most respected developers. After Allen’s passing, the team at Vulcan saw a need to reposition themselves in the market and reimagine their vision for the future. Alongside our partners at Stoke Strategy and Metric Media, we helped breathe new life into Vulcan’s brand with a revitalized strategy, visual identity, and website.

metadata.summary: A new website for a PNW general contractor, built from the ground up to elevate and celebrate their outcomes-minded approach to construction and provide them with a modern, dynamic platform to establish credibility, demonstrate leadership, and attract talent.

content.headline: builds resilient, future-ready projects in the PNW
content.description: Rooted in the Pacific Northwest’s culture of innovation and creativity, GLY is one of the region's most respected locally-owned general contractors. We designed and built their new website from the ground up to elevate and celebrate their outcomes-minded approach to construction and provide them with a modern, dynamic platform to establish credibility, demonstrate leadership within their industry, and attract talent.

media.alt: The first five modules on the GLY homepage
A row of mobile screenshots showing off the design of the GLY Website
Close up shot of a water bottle with the new Vulcan Real Estate Logo
Detail view of the nav menu overlay on the GLY website

metadata.summary: This is my first Figma plugin—a simple, flexible lorem ipsum generator. It smoothes out the issues I have with other, similar plugins. Specifically, it runs through a bunch of custom logic before outputting the result to make sure that you end up with ipsum that look more like proper sentences.

Carbon Direct is a purpose-driven carbon management firm enabling organizations to measure, reduce, and remove their emissions. No longer a scrappy startup, they needed a brand and website that better communicated the scale and capabilities of their company.

content.headline: is standing on the shoulders of science
content.description: Carbon Direct is a purpose-driven carbon management firm enabling organizations to reduce, remove, and utilize their emissions. No longer a scrappy startup, they needed a brand and digital presence that better communicated the scale and capabilities of their company and matched their approach to business — intelligent, dynamic, and distinctive.

metadata.summary: Wildtype is an agtech company working to create the cleanest, most sustainable seafood on the planet. We worked with them create a bespoke digital experience that would allow them to promote their mission, connect with chefs and restaurateurs, and appeal to consumers who may be skeptical of lab-grown meat.

Squiggler is a free generative design tool to help you quickly create random, unique SVG waves and squiggles. Developing it required a lot of research into the technical details of how SVG paths are drawn and the math behind sin waves, but the result is a simple and easy-to-use single-purpose app.

This Figma plugin is the one-stop shop for finding and using high-quality images inside of your Figma projects, allowing you to browse popular free libraries like Unsplash, Pexels, and Pixabay at the same time without leaving the app. Built with Svelte, Tailwind, and Typescript.
